name: CLS Holdings
overview:
CLS Holdings plc is a property investment company which has been listed on the London Stock Exchange since 1994. The company has a market capitalisation in excess of Â£233.3m and a property portfolio in London, France, Germany and Sweden valued at Â£813.0m (31 December 2009).

CLS has invested primarily in office buildings let on long leases in order to achieve stable cash flows. Its established local management operate from offices in London, Paris, Stockholm and Hamburg and their priority is to meet the requirements of tenants by providing high quality premises with efficient and proactive management services incorporating the latest technical and IT facilities.

funding_round.source_description: Repeatit secures additional funding in round led by CLS Holdings and Industrifonden
